text: irisumi ya dasi yemīderegilachewinina dasi yemayideregilachewini ātikilitochi yefet’ere newi፡፡ zemibabanimi (yetemirini zafi) āzimeranimi firēwochu yeteleyayu sīẖonu weyiranina rumaninimi (k’it’elachewi) temesasayina (t’a‘imachewi) yemayimesaseli sīẖonu (fet’ere)፡፡ bafera gīzē kefirēwi bilu፡፡ be’āch’edawimi k’eni tegebīwini (zeka) sit’u፡፡ ātabakinumi፡፡ irisu ābakanyochini āyiwedimina፡፡
